explains: v. 描述，刻画；成为……的特征，是……的典型

sentences.en: The piercing cries of the rhinoceros hornbill characterize the Southeast Asian rain forest, as do the unmistakable calls of the gibbons.
sentences.cn: 犀鸟刺耳的鸣叫，和长臂猿那不会被认错的叫声，象征着东南亚雨林。

sentences.en: How does one characterize Benjamin Franklin?
sentences.cn: 怎么描绘本杰明·富兰克林（Benjamin Franklin）呢？
